Profile.meta_description: Profile, tech stack, and achievements of Web Developer Lunacea
Profile.about_paragraph: Welcome to our About page! We are a team of passionate individuals dedicated to creating amazing software.
Profile.mission_description: Creating products that contribute to environments where people can comfortably express themselves
Profile.mission_statement_detail_1: Aiming to 'create products that contribute to an environment where people can comfortably express themselves,
Profile.mission_statement_detail_2: I develop products with a user-first approach.
Profile.research_affiliation: Iwate Prefectural University, Graduate School of Software and Information Science
Profile.research_description_1: Currently developing a feedback visualization system for online customer reviews.
Profile.research_description_2: Advancing research and development with a focus on user-centered design.
Profile.vr_app_dev_description: Desktop application development utilizing C#, Whisper API, and Excel output.
Profile.notification_app_dev_description: Full-stack development with Next.js + TypeScript, utilizing OneSignal.
Profile.video_chat_app_dev_description: Development considering the connection environment with Vue.js and WebRTC.
Profile.hackathon_project_description_1: Developed 'TunaAgri,' a Svelte app for generating farmers' profile QR codes.
Profile.hackathon_project_description_2: Received an award for its ease of implementation and solution for community revitalization.
Profile.hackathon_project_description_3: Developed 'Cooooster,' a Next.js app for collecting and recording coastlines. Users can save photos and information of visited beaches, and track changes in coastlines.
Profile.leadership_description: Managed an organization of approximately 200 members, led joint concerts with other circles, and implemented regulation improvements.
Profile.education_master_details: Master's Program, Software and Information Science (Current Student)
Profile.education_bachelor_ipu_details: Faculty of Software and Information Science, Graduated
Profile.education_bachelor_tohoku_details: Faculty of Engineering, Department of Materials Science and Engineering, Transferred
Profile.core_strengths_title: Things I Value in Product Development
Profile.core_strength_user_centric_description: Always focus on what to achieve and who to create for, and select flexible means for achieving it.
Profile.core_strength_learning_description: Actively acquire new technologies and knowledge, constantly striving for self-improvement. Actively acquire new technologies and knowledge, constantly striving for self-improvement.
Profile.core_strength_teamwork_description: Value communication and create a bright, comfortable, and communicative environment. Discover new things and learn from diverse people.

Works.meta_description: Showcasing web development projects and applications portfolio.
Works.project_description_1: Built with Next.js 15 and Tailwind CSS. Multi-language support, dark mode, and responsive design.
Works.project_description_2: Won the Mayor's Award at Takizawa Hackathon 7. A web app for generating QR codes for farmer profiles.
Works.project_description_3: Won the Effort Award at GEEK HACKATHON vol.8. A web app for collecting and recording coastlines. Users can save photos and information of visited beaches, and track changes in coastlines.
